entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 2:49 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
